name: TurboGambit
description:
The adrenal gland's memory of chess. Rules are out the window. You are seeing red. Kill to the beat.

Music by Gargoyle (support on soundcloud, spotify, or bandcamp)

How to play:

  • Move to the beat with WASD or arrow keys
  • the piece you control moves the way it would in normal chess
  • avoid aggressive enemies and mines

This game is very early in development. Feedback is very welcome!
